GK19kmeghdpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMgD_1 //
GK19kmeghdpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:3: āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMgD_2 //
GK19kmeghdpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau /
GK19kmeghdpu:5: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe // KMgD_3 //
GK19kmeghdpu:6: pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim /
GK19kmeghdpu:7: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra // KMgD_4 //
GK19kmeghdpu:8: dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:9: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMgD_5 //
GK19kmeghdpu:10: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:11: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā moghā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā // KMgD_6 //
GK19kmeghdpu:12: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:13: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā // KMgD_7 //
GK19kmeghdpu:14: tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:15: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ // KMgD_8 //
GK19kmeghdpu:16: mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:17: garbhādhānakṣaṇaparicayān nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ // KMgD_9 //
GK19kmeghdpu:18: tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjāyām /
GK19kmeghdpu:19: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi // KMgD_10 //
GK19kmeghdpu:20: kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilīndhrām avandhyāṃ tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:21: ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ // KMgD_11 //
GK19kmeghdpu:22: āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu /
GK19kmeghdpu:23: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam // KMgD_12 //
GK19kmeghdpu:24: mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānurūpaṃ saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam /
GK19kmeghdpu:25: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya // KMgD_13 //
GK19kmeghdpu:26: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:27: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān // KMgD_14 //
GK19kmeghdpu:28: ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuḥkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:29: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveṣasya viṣṇoḥ // KMgD_15 //
GK19kmeghdpu:30: tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārānabhijñaiḥ prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:31: sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhikṣetram āruhya mālaṃ kiṃ cit paścād vraja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa // KMgD_16 //
GK19kmeghdpu:32: tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:33: na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ // KMgD_17 //
GK19kmeghdpu:34: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe /
GK19kmeghdpu:35: nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ // KMgD_18 //
GK19kmeghdpu:36: sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtaṃ toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:37: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya // KMgD_19 //
GK19kmeghdpu:38: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:39: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya // KMgD_20 //
GK19kmeghdpu:40: nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham /
GK19kmeghdpu:41: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam // KMgD_21 //
GK19kmeghdpu:42: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
GK19kmeghdpu:43: śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet // KMgD_22 //
GK19kmeghdpu:44: pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:45: tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ // KMgD_23 //
GK19kmeghdpu:46: teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ gatvā sadyaḥ phalam api mahat kāmukatvasya labdhā /
GK19kmeghdpu:47: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi // KMgD_24 //
GK19kmeghdpu:48: nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:49: yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni // KMgD_25 //
GK19kmeghdpu:50: viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann udyānānāṃ navajalakaṇair yūthikājālakāni /
GK19kmeghdpu:52: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:53: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMgD_27 //
GK19kmeghdpu:55: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMgD_28 //
GK19kmeghdpu:56: veṇībhūtapratanusalilā tām atītasya sindhuḥ pāṇḍucchāyā taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:57: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantī kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ // KMgD_29 //
GK19kmeghdpu:58: prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām /
GK19kmeghdpu:59: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam // KMgD_30 //
GK19kmeghdpu:60: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:61: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ // KMgD_31 //
GK19kmeghdpu:62: jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūpair bandhuprītyā bhavanaśikhibhir dattanṛttopahāraḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:63: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu // KMgD_32 //
GK19kmeghdpu:64: bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:65: dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ // KMgD_33 //
GK19kmeghdpu:66: apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad atyeti bhānuḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:67: kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām // KMgD_34 //
GK19kmeghdpu:68: pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra līlāvadhūtai ratnacchāyāracitavalibhiś cāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:69: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn āmokṣyante tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān // KMgD_35 //
GK19kmeghdpu:70: paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:71: nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā // KMgD_36 //
GK19kmeghdpu:72: gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:73: saudāmanyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ // KMgD_37 //
GK19kmeghdpu:74: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:75: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ // KMgD_38 //
GK19kmeghdpu:76: tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu /
GK19kmeghdpu:77: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ // KMgD_39 //
GK19kmeghdpu:78: gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam /
GK19kmeghdpu:79: tasmād asyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni // KMgD_40 //
GK19kmeghdpu:80: tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam /
GK19kmeghdpu:81: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi jñātāsvādo vivṛtajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ // KMgD_41 //
GK19kmeghdpu:83: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām // KMgD_42 //
GK19kmeghdpu:84: tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā puṣpāsāraiḥ snapayatu bhavān vyomagaṅgājalādreḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:85: rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ // KMgD_43 //
GK19kmeghdpu:86: jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī putrapremṇā kuvalayadalaprāpi karṇe karoti /
GK19kmeghdpu:87: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ // KMgD_44 //
GK19kmeghdpu:88: ārādhyainaṃ śaravaṇabhavaṃ devam ullaṅghitādhvā siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:89: vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim // KMgD_45 //
GK19kmeghdpu:90: tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham /
GK19kmeghdpu:91: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam // KMgD_46 //
GK19kmeghdpu:92: tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ pakṣmotkṣepād uparivilasatkṛṣṇaśāraprabhāṇām /
GK19kmeghdpu:94: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:95: rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni // KMgD_48 //
GK19kmeghdpu:96: hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ revatīlocanāṅkāṃ bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve /
GK19kmeghdpu:97: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ saumya sārasvatīnām antaḥśuddhas tvam asi bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ // KMgD_49 //
GK19kmeghdpu:98: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim /
GK19kmeghdpu:99: gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā // KMgD_50 //
GK19kmeghdpu:100: tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni paścārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:101: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopagatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā // KMgD_51 //
GK19kmeghdpu:102: āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:103: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ śubhratrinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām // KMgD_52 //
GK19kmeghdpu:104: taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā bādhetolkākṣapitacamarībālabhāro davāgniḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:105: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām // KMgD_53 //
GK19kmeghdpu:106: ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ svāṅgabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam /
GK19kmeghdpu:107: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ // KMgD_54 //
GK19kmeghdpu:108: tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:109: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ kalpante 'sya sthiragaṇapadaprāptaye śraddadhānāḥ // KMgD_55 //
GK19kmeghdpu:110: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:111: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandareṣu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ // KMgD_56 //
GK19kmeghdpu:112: prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram /
GK19kmeghdpu:113: tenodīcīṃ diśam anusares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ // KMgD_57 //
GK19kmeghdpu:114: gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ syāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:115: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratidiśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ // KMgD_58 //
GK19kmeghdpu:116: utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate snigdhabhinnāñjanābhe sadyaḥkṛttadviradadaśanacchedagaurasya tasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:117: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva // KMgD_59 //
GK19kmeghdpu:118: hitvā tasmin bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī /
GK19kmeghdpu:119: bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalaughaḥ sopānatvaṃ kuru padasukhasparśam ārohaṇeṣu // KMgD_60 //
GK19kmeghdpu:120: tatrāvaśyaṃ valayakuliśodghaṭṭanodgīrṇatoyaṃ neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo yantradhārāgṛhatvam /
GK19kmeghdpu:121: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ // KMgD_61 //
GK19kmeghdpu:122: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:123: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśes taṃ nagendram // KMgD_62 //
GK19kmeghdpu:124: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādukūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin /
GK19kmeghdpu:125: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam // KMgD_63 //
GK19kmeghdpu:126: vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam /
GK19kmeghdpu:127: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMgD_64 //
GK19kmeghdpu:128: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā lodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:129: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām // KMgD_65 //
GK19kmeghdpu:130: yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:131: āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv āhateṣu // KMgD_66 //
GK19kmeghdpu:132: yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujocchvāsitāliṅgitānām aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ tantujālāvalambāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:133: tvatsaṃrodhāpagamaviśadaiś cotitāś candrapādair vyālumpanti sphuṭajalalavasyandinaś candrakāntāḥ // KMgD_67 //
GK19kmeghdpu:134: netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr ālekhyānāṃ salilakaṇikādoṣam utpādya sadyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:135: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇā jarjarā niṣpatanti // KMgD_68 //
GK19kmeghdpu:136: nīvībandhocchvasitaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu /
GK19kmeghdpu:137: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇā cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ // KMgD_69 //
GK19kmeghdpu:138: gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ patracchedaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ karṇavibhraṃśibhiś ca /
GK19kmeghdpu:139: muktājālaiḥ stanaparicitacchinnasūtraiś ca hārair naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām // KMgD_70 //
GK19kmeghdpu:140: matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam /
GK19kmeghdpu:141: sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ // KMgD_71 //
GK19kmeghdpu:142: tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhād uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena /
GK19kmeghdpu:143: yasyodyāne kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastabakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ // KMgD_72 //
GK19kmeghdpu:144: vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:145: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ nādhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ // KMgD_73 //
GK19kmeghdpu:146: tasyās tīre racitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:147: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi // KMgD_74 //
GK19kmeghdpu:148: raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter mādhavīmaṇḍapasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:149: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ // KMgD_75 //
GK19kmeghdpu:150: tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir mūle baddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:151: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ // KMgD_76 //
GK19kmeghdpu:152: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣayethā dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā /
GK19kmeghdpu:153: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām // KMgD_77 //
GK19kmeghdpu:154: gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ krīḍāśaile prathamakathite ramyasānau niṣaṇṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:155: arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim // KMgD_78 //
GK19kmeghdpu:156: tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharoṣṭhī madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇīprekṣaṇā nimnanābhiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:157: śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ // KMgD_79 //
GK19kmeghdpu:158: tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām /
GK19kmeghdpu:159: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāṃ guruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām // KMgD_80 //
GK19kmeghdpu:160: nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharoṣṭham /
GK19kmeghdpu:161: hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter bibharti // KMgD_81 //
GK19kmeghdpu:162: āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī /
GK19kmeghdpu:163: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ sārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi rasike tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti // KMgD_82 //
GK19kmeghdpu:164: utsaṅge vā malinavasane saumya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā /
GK19kmeghdpu:165: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī // KMgD_83 //
GK19kmeghdpu:166: śeṣān māsān virahadivasasthāpitasyāvadher vā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīmuktapuṣpaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:167: sambhogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ // KMgD_84 //
GK19kmeghdpu:168: savyāpārām ahani na tathā pīḍayed viprayogaḥ śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te /
GK19kmeghdpu:169: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ // KMgD_85 //
GK19kmeghdpu:170: ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃniṣaṇṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:171: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā tām evoṣṇair virahamahatīm aśrubhir yāpayantīm // KMgD_86 //
GK19kmeghdpu:172: niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam /
GK19kmeghdpu:173: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām // KMgD_87 //
GK19kmeghdpu:174: ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā tāṃ mayodveṣṭanīyām /
GK19kmeghdpu:175: sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamām ekaveṇīṃ kareṇa // KMgD_88 //
GK19kmeghdpu:176: pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva /
GK19kmeghdpu:177: cakṣuḥ khedāt salilagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ sābhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām // KMgD_89 //
GK19kmeghdpu:178: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram /
GK19kmeghdpu:179: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā // KMgD_90 //
GK19kmeghdpu:180: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi /
GK19kmeghdpu:181: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat // KMgD_91 //
GK19kmeghdpu:182: ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam /
GK19kmeghdpu:183: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhāc calakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti // KMgD_92 //
GK19kmeghdpu:184: vāmaś cāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā /
GK19kmeghdpu:185: saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś calatvam // KMgD_93 //
GK19kmeghdpu:186: tasmin kāle jalada yadi sā labdhanidrāsukhā syād anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva /
GK19kmeghdpu:187: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gāḍhopagūḍham // KMgD_94 //
GK19kmeghdpu:188: tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām /
GK19kmeghdpu:189: vidyudgarbhe stimitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ // KMgD_95 //
GK19kmeghdpu:190: bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam /
GK19kmeghdpu:191: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni // KMgD_96 //
GK19kmeghdpu:192: ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva /
GK19kmeghdpu:193: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ // KMgD_97 //
GK19kmeghdpu:194: tām āyuṣman mama ca vacanād ātmanaś copakartuṃ brūyā evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:195: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva // KMgD_98 //
GK19kmeghdpu:196: aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena /
GK19kmeghdpu:197: uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpais tair viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ // KMgD_99 //
GK19kmeghdpu:198: śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt /
GK19kmeghdpu:199: so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanābhyām adṛṣṭas tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha // KMgD_100 //
GK19kmeghdpu:200: śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān /
GK19kmeghdpu:201: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te caṇḍi sādṛśyam asti // KMgD_101 //
GK19kmeghdpu:202: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum /
GK19kmeghdpu:203: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālupyate me krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // KMgD_102 //
GK19kmeghdpu:204: mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor labdhāyās te katham api mayā svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu /
GK19kmeghdpu:205: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv aśruleśāḥ patanti // KMgD_103 //
GK19kmeghdpu:206: bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:207: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti // KMgD_104 //
GK19kmeghdpu:208: saṃkṣipyeta kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt /
GK19kmeghdpu:209: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ // KMgD_105 //
GK19kmeghdpu:210: nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam /
GK19kmeghdpu:211: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa // KMgD_106 //
GK19kmeghdpu:212: śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā /
GK19kmeghdpu:213: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu // KMgD_107 //
GK19kmeghdpu:214: bhūyaś cāha tvam asi śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā /
GK19kmeghdpu:215: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // KMgD_108 //
GK19kmeghdpu:216: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:217: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe hrāsinas te hy abhogād iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti // KMgD_109 //
GK19kmeghdpu:218: kac cit saumya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyādeśān na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ kalpayāmi /
GK19kmeghdpu:219: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva // KMgD_110 //
GK19kmeghdpu:220: etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā /
GK19kmeghdpu:221: iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ // KMgD_111 //
